name: Great Escape (itch)
description:
Small and simple game about the inevitable loss of socks after washing made for LD50.

Your mission is simple. Don't let your socks escape!

You can choose from 2 difficulties and two game modes. 

In mode "Paires" you are trying to save the most color-paired socks you can. 

In mode "Singles" you are so despearate, that you are just trying to save as much socks as possible.


Controls are simple. Just use your mouse to grab those little running textile bastard before they can run away from the screen. Repeat until time limit ends and you can enjoy sockfull life. 

Game features such amazing things as handdrawn socks and... that's about it.

Thanks for playing and enjoy!
